items.question: Is it really free?
items.answer: Yes! Our free plan allows you to create 1 resume, track unlimited applications, and use our basic templates. No credit card required.

items.question: What is an ATS score?
items.answer: ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems) are used by 98% of large companies to filter resumes. Our ATS score tells you if your resume will pass these automatic filters.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your Premium subscription anytime from your profile. No commitment.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes, we use bank-level encryption to protect your data. Your personal information is never shared with third parties.

items.question: Can I export my resume as PDF?
items.answer: Yes, all plans (free and premium) include PDF export of your resumes.
